name: University Tycoon: 2019
description: Become the principal of your very own university!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1GHz processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card with 512Mb DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2GHz Dual Core processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card with 1Gb DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
